Title: Cigarette Burns
Plot: Oliver tells Dawson he's arranged a screening for their movie, which is yet to be finished. Dawson freaks out, but Joey comforts him saying the movie is brilliant. Everybody attends to the screening and solve their conflicts while waiting for it to start. Dawson meets a handful woman, and after exchanging insults she reveals herself to be Amy Lloyd, movie critic for Boston Weekly, whom Oliver secretly invited for the screening. GuestStars: Meredith Salenger, Afemo Omilami, Denny Zartman, Jonathan Kasdan, Busy Philipps
